text:
In England, it's the @EnvAgency who issues flood alerts, warnings and severe flood warnings. 

The red triangles show where we currently have WARNINGS in place. 

Details here: https://t.co/IvicZu6jAX. (In Wales, it's @NatResWales and in Scotland it's @ScottishEPA). (5/8) https://t.co/h2wzbjwyVo
